name: Asia 0900 ORB - RR2.0 HALF
hypothesis_text: 0900 ORB breakout with HALF SL mode. Entry: First 1m close outside ORB after 09:05. Stop: ORB midpoint (HALF mode). Target: RR=2.0. Scan window: 09:05 → 11:00 (ISOLATION mode: force exit at 11:00). Expected: 0.099R avg (254 trades), 2/3 positive split stability.

slippage_assumptions.notes: Zero slippage assumed in research. Stress tests pending.
